channel.title: Were can i get my dsn from?
channel.description: I am currently on the install screen of phpbb and it is asking me for my databse url/dsn i made mysql database in my cpanel but cant find the link to it to enter in the required field any 1 know were?

item.title: Were can i get my dsn from?
item.dc:creator: @eDIT1 -eDIT-
item.description:
@eDIT1 wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:6, topic:431489”]well thats if its running on the same computer this is hosting the webpage. but that works then it is[/quote] http://www.developphp.com/forum/view_topic.php?cat=1&otid=28643&title=Hosting24%20%20-%20%20connecting%20to%20mysql i dont think soo
